#FacialRecognition tech. does not have a place in public housing given its biases toward women & POC. It's why I put together legislation to ban it from public housing. Today along with @AyannaPressley & @RepRashida we introduced the No Biometric Barriers Housing Act of 2019. 👊🏾

•How did ConEd make the decision to pre-emptively cut 30,000 residents off from electricity in southeast Brooklyn? 

•What further measures could ConEd take & what types of support would be most effective to transform NYC's electrical grid to bring it into the 21st Cent?(3/3)

We need answers and solutions from @ConEdison  about:

•What measures is Con Edison currently taking to modernize our grid, prevent similar power outages in the future, and increase grid resiliency?  (2/3)

#Brooklyn residents deserve a modern power grid that is resilient and ready for the needs of the 21st Century, which is why I’m requesting a meeting (as you can see in this letter) with @ConEdison to discuss how we can prevent these power outages from happening again.  (1/3) pic.twitter.com/GMZ02GfJPN

The Commission in my legislation will investigate the conditions wherever migrants are being held in this country because no child or person should be subjected to live in inhumane conditions, let alone die from where the American government has caged them. (4/4)

▫️have those who sit on it be appointed by Congress
be unlike inspector general investigations because the White House cannot block nor interfere in the investigation
▫️have funding and full-time staff dedicated exclusively to uncover the truth and pursue accountability (3/4)

The National Commission will:
▫️establish an independent body to investigate treatment of migrant families & children by the Trump admin
▫️function similarly to the 9/11 Commission, having full subpoena authority & the ability to pull records from relevant fed. agencies (2/4)

ICYMI: This week I introduced legislation, which passed Homeland Security Committee, to create a 9/11 style commission to establish an independent body to investigate the treatment of migrant families & children by the Trump administration. #ImmigrantRightsAreHumanRights (1/4) pic.twitter.com/U2RzogsHrs
